decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to finish off opponents or clear the way for attacks. To further disrupt opponents' game plans, the deck includes cards like Blood Moon and Arena of Glory. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional ways to buff up creatures and close out games quickly.

The main concept of this Aggro-Affinity deck is to quickly drop artifact creatures and utilize various artifacts to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Engineered Explosives, Mishra's Bauble, and Tormod's Crypt provide utility while Mox Opal and Urza's Saga help ramp up mana for bigger plays. Emry, Lurker of the Loch can recur artifacts from the graveyard, while Metallic Rebuke offers counter spells for protection. Kappa Cannoneer, Weapons Manufacturing, and Pinnacle Emissary provide aggressive creatures to pressure the opponent. Lavaspur Boots and Fiery Islet offer additional removal and damage options.

The deck focuses on quickly playing artifacts and using them to generate mana and draw cards. It utilizes cards like Mox Opal, Mishra's Bauble, and Urza's Saga to ramp up and maintain card advantage. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide recurring value by returning artifacts from the graveyard or drawing additional cards. Support cards like Metallic Rebuke and Unholy Heat help control the board while also enabling aggressive plays. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of speed, card advantage, and disruption.

The main focus of this deck is to control the opponent's actions and board state through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck also utilizes cards like Terminus and Solitude for board wipes and removal, while also including cards like Hall of Storm Giants for a strong win condition. The inclusion of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion adds an additional layer of synergy and value to the deck. Ultimately, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through superior control.

This aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a variety of aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. The strategy revolves around using efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu, alongside powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial. The deck also includes Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Arena of Glory provides additional support for the creatures, while The Legend of Roku and Scion of Draco offer additional win conditions. Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory provide additional utility and control options.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, leveraging cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer to generate value and pressure. The inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Goblin Bombardment disrupt the opponent's game plan while cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provide powerful finishers. The deck aims to establish board control early and maintain pressure throughout the game, utilizing a mix of creatures and burn spells to close out the game quickly.

The deck focuses on assembling a quick and deadly combo using equipment like Colossus Hammer and Leyline Axe, along with creatures like Puresteel Paladin and Cori-Steel Cutter. Urza's Saga helps tutor for key pieces while Mox Opal ramps up mana production. The deck aims to create a powerful threat with minimal setup, overwhelming opponents with a lethal combination of equipment and creatures. The synergy between the cards allows for explosive turns and efficient wins in a fast-paced Modern format.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on using a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage to control the opponent's plays and win the game through incremental advantage. The deck includes powerful control elements like Consign to Memory, Subtlety, and Force of Negation to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage with cards like Quantum Riddler and Meticulous Archive. The deck also includes threats like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to close out the game quickly once the opponent's resources are depleted.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while establishing a strong board presence with aggressive creatures. Utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Path to Exile, you can control the board and remove threats to pave the way for your creatures to attack. Key cards like Overlord of the Balemurk and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd provide strong beatdown potential, while Flickerwisp and Solitude offer versatility in handling threats. Teferi, Time Raveler helps to protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's plans, allowing you to outpace your opponent and secure victory through relentless aggression.

The key concept of this deck is to aggressively attack your opponent with low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while using spells like Mutagenic Growth and Lightning Bolt to disrupt your opponent's game plan. Slickshot Show-Off and Cori-Steel Cutter provide additional ways to deal damage, while cards like Expressive Iteration and Preordain help you dig through your deck to find the cards you need. The deck aims to win quickly by overwhelming your opponent with a fast and efficient aggression strategy.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. The deck focuses on using cards like Goblin Bombardment, Thraben Charm, and Galvanic Discharge to control the board while creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury deal damage to the opponent. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional support and protection for the creatures. The deck also includes cards like Arena of Glory and Ocelot Pride for resilience and consistency in the aggro strategy.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced aggressive strategy focused on quickly building a board presence and dealing damage efficiently. By using powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, along with support from cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total while controlling the board with removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm. Additionally, cards like Arena of Glory and Voice of Victory provide the deck with additional advantages in combat and burn potential.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to aggressively play creatures and pump them up with cards like Ajani and Thraben Charm to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Blood Moon and Goblin Bombardment to disrupt the opponent's strategy and control the board. Additionally, the deck contains versatile cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Ragavan for additional value. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent casting of spells and maximizing the synergy between creatures and support cards.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Consign to Memory and Galvanic Discharge to control the board, and creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd to deal damage, the deck aims to close out the game quickly. Cards like Solitude and Quantum Riddler provide additional removal and disruption to keep the opponent on their back foot. The deck also includes some card advantage and tempo plays with cards like Ephemerate and Teferi, Time Raveler to further hinder the opponent's strategy.

This deck utilizes the Cascade mechanic to continuously cycle through cards until it can cast Living End, which allows the player to reanimate all creatures from their graveyard. The goal is to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures using cards like Street Wraith and Shardless Agent, then cast Living End to put a large board presence into play. Force of Negation helps protect the combo, while cards like Endurance provide graveyard disruption for the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board state and quick tempo plays.

This deck focuses on generating mana quickly with rituals and mana-enhancing spells to cast a high number of spells in a single turn. The key strategy is to chain multiple spells together to generate a large storm count, allowing for a massive Grapeshot finisher or Past in Flames recursion for additional spell casting. Ral, Monsoon Mage provides card advantage and additional storm triggers. The deck also includes Wish to search for specific spells, improving consistency. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and burn spells for a quick victory.
